#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;
#define ull unsigned long long
ull fact[200001],C[200001][400];

ull answer(int n,int k)
{if(n<2)
{return -1;}
	ull ans=0;
for(int r=1;r<=sqrt(k);r++)
{ans=(ans+C[n+r-3][r-1]*(k/r-r+1))%1000000007;
}
return ans;
}
int main() {fact[0]=1;
for(int i=1;i<200001;i++)
{fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i)%1000000007;}

for(int i=0;i<100001+1001;i++)
{C[i][0]=1;
for(int j=1;j<min(i+1,350);j++)
{C[i][j]=(C[i-1][j]+C[i-1][j-1])%1000000007;}
}
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{int n,k;
scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
if(n<2)
{cout<<-1<<endl;
continue;}
printf("%lld\n",answer(n,k));}
	return 0;
}
